com.github.privacystreams.core.commons.common

Class ItemCommons

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.privacystreams.core.commons.common.ItemCommons

  • public class ItemCommons
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by yuanchun on 29/12/2016. A helper class to access common item functions

        public static <Tout> Function<com.github.privacystreams.core.Item,Tout> outputSubStream(Function<java.util.List<com.github.privacystreams.core.Item>,Tout> subStreamFunction)
        A function that output the sub stream in the item. This function must be applied to a group item, that is, the item must have a "sub_stream" field and the field is in Stream type.
        Type Parameters:
        Tout - the type of sub stream collection result.
        Parameters:
        subStreamFunction - the function to output sub stream.
        Returns:
        the function

      • includeFields

        public static Function<com.github.privacystreams.core.Item,com.github.privacystreams.core.Item> includeFields(java.lang.String... fieldsToInclude)
        A function that projects an item by including some fields. The fields not included will not be present in output.
        Parameters:
        fieldsToInclude - the names of the fields to include.
        Returns:
        the item mapper function.

      • excludeFields

        public static Function<com.github.privacystreams.core.Item,com.github.privacystreams.core.Item> excludeFields(java.lang.String... fieldsToExclude)
        A function that projects an item by excluding some fields. The fields excluded will not be present in output.
        Parameters:
        fieldsToExclude - the names of the fields to exclude.
        Returns:
        the item mapper function.
